remarks: An absolute value distributes under multiplication.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
abvf.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` R ) $.
abvf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
abvmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
abvmul $p |- ( ( F e. A /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( F ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) x. ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
